text: Kevin Manuel Rivera Serrano (born 28 June 1998 in Cartago) is a Costa Rican cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . For the 2021 season, Rivera will join the team on a two-year contract. ==Major results== ;2017 : 1st 20px Overall Tour of China II ::1st Stage 1 ;2018 : 1st Stage 7 Vuelta al Táchira ;2019 : 1st 20px Overall Sibiu Cycling Tour ::1st 20px Young rider classification ::1st Stage 2 : 3rd Overall Tour of China II ::1st 20px Mountains classification ::1st Stage 3 : 9th Milano–Torino : 10th Overall Tour of Bihor ::1st 20px Young rider classification ;2020 : 1st Stage 4 Tour de Langkawi : 3rd Overall Vuelta al Táchira ::1st 20px Young rider classification ::1st 20px Mountains classification ::1st Stages 6 (ITT) & 7 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Costa Rican male cyclists Category:People from Cartago Province
title: Kevin Rivera
